Dating: NEW KINGDOM (not before); PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Exercise in low-relief: bust of a king and feet
Description: The recto of this fragment of a model contains only a minimal part of the bust of a king: only the ear and the "nemes" head-dress are still clearly visible. On the left shoulder, one sees also traces of a finely detailed collar. The verso is decorated with a representation of the two feet of a person who is wearing a long robe.
